definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
Guo Moruo (1892-1978), writer, communist party intellectual and cultural apparatchik
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
aerosol/spray/mist/splattered drops/spray from sneeze or saliva
Liao Mosha (1907-1990), journalist and communist propagandist, severely criticized and imprisoned for 10 years during the Cultural Revolution
Agnes Smedley (1892-1950), US journalist and activist, reported on China, esp. the communist side

sentences.english: I am forever walking upon these shores betwixt the sand and the foam .
sentences.chinese: 我走在這海岸上，在沙與沫之間。

sentences.english: Do tea pieces come out from the pillow core?
sentences.chinese: 茶葉沫是否會滲透出枕芯？

sentences.english: Put the creamy soup, cabbages and spices, boil them, skin away the froth.
sentences.chinese: 湯鍋放奶湯，放白菜小料燒開，撇去沫。

sentences.english: A beard well lathered is half shaved.
sentences.chinese: 皁沫塗得好，鬍鬚半剃掉。

sentences.english: Well. Your mom didn't tell us about the blobbies.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，你媽媽到沒有跟我們說巧克力沫的事情。

sentences.english: I am forever walking upon these shores, 1) betwixt the sand and the foam.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠走在這些岸上，在沙與沫之間。

sentences.english: Grilled to perfection marinated with paprika and garlic chicken thigh.
sentences.chinese: 烤經紅柿椒粉和大蒜沫浸泡過的雞腿肉，使味道更美。

sentences.english: What is raped young wild, foam to a pure smiling face?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼掠奪了年少時的狂野，沫去了那張純真的笑臉？

definition: Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
to drip/to strain or filter/a trickle
to skim froth or foam from the surface of a liquid
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
